attributes.action: make Abbey (formerly Abbey National) employ more counter staff, especially in Enfield.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is my belief that by reducing the number of staff at the counter, Abbey are forcing their customers via long queues, to deposit money and cheques using the ATMs which take an additional two days to clear. This, I believe, is a calculated way of keeping our money for a longer period of time without us being able to use it.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
